Name: Wretched Depths
About the game: Sam, an avid fishing fan, has traveled to the remote Twin Pines to cast into the mysterious Lake Imperium. However as she begins to adjust to her surroundings. Odd and unexplainable events begin to occur left and right in a town where the people seem strange, and the fish even stranger. Play as Sam and fish to your hearts content, sell the fish you've caught, collect better gear, and use it to explore deeper into the depths of the mysterious lake. But, be warned as no one knows what lies at the bottom of Lake Imperium. Do you really want to find out what lurks below...? Wretched Depths is a PSX-style horror fishing game created by students in the University of Utah's Entertainment Arts & Engineering capstone class. The game is currently in development. Please look forward to an official release date later in 2023. Key Features: A dynamic fishing system A manageable inventory Multiple different types of fish at different depths Jump scares around every corner A buying and selling system
